comments.body:
This line is giving me an error, and I don't understand it. (It's also hard to get a minimal reproducible case, but it didn't show in one project but then all of a sudden did start)

```
node_modules/@types/rebass__grid/index.d.ts:40:18 - error TS2320: Interface 'BoxProps' cannot simultaneously extend types 'Pick<Pick<DetailedHTMLProps<HTMLAttributes<HTMLDivElement>, HTMLDivElement>, "color" | "hidden" | "dir" | "slot" | "style" | "title" | "children" | "className" | "id" | "lang" | ... 240 more ... | "css"> & { ...; }, "hidden" | ... 249 more ... | undefined>' and 'CommonProps'.
  Named property 'css' of types 'Pick<Pick<DetailedHTMLProps<HTMLAttributes<HTMLDivElement>, HTMLDivElement>, "color" | "hidden" | "dir" | "slot" | "style" | "title" | "children" | "className" | "id" | "lang" | ... 240 more ... | "css"> & { ...; }, "hidden" | ... 249 more ... | undefined>' and 'CommonProps' are not identical.

40 export interface BoxProps
                    ~~~~~~~~
```

I'll continue trying to get a reproducible case, but that may take a little time, I've spent wayyy to long trying to track this down already.

@antonvasin Thank you for the review ðŸ˜„ Added a test.

https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/34375/commits/98948774d47838ad5321bac7529b71d56f96b152

```tsx
        // as
        <Box as="span" />
        <Box as={Layout} />
```
